Text:
been trying to get this to work, but none of my players can play this  (media player, zoomplayer), it either runs to fast or slow , on vlc i got no sound,

too bad, its an awesome movie

Cannot play this. Comes out all pixelated and sticks a lot when trying to play on Nero 9.5. Tried demuxing and was even worse. Coverted to mpeg2 HD 1280 and seems to have fixed the problem. Just wanted to let you know. I do appreciate the effort.
VLC everyone. You'll never have problems playing video again.
